description:
KaOS Linux 2024.07 independent distribution is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.9 and the KDE Plasma 6.1 desktop. Here's what else is new!

The post KaOS Linux 2024.07 Released with KDE Plasma 6.1 and Linux Kernel 6.9 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KaOS Linux 2024.07 Released with KDE Plasma 6.1 and Linux Kernel 6.9
